  1. Summer Day Camp 2018


    Are your children looking for something fun to do this summer?  Register for our annual summer Day Camp, held at Windermere School.  We offer a vareity of care options, games, crafts, outdoor fun, field trips and much more.  Click HERE for details.  


  1. Swim Lessons


    The Ellington Recreation Department offers a variety swim lesson classes taught by our certified life guards.  Swim lessons are held at Crystal Lake's Sandy Beach. Register for swim lessons online or down at our office located at 31 Arbor Way. View 2019 Swim Lesson Schedule


  1. Skyhawk Camps


    Skyhawks Sports Academy provides sports programs where children discover and develop athletic skills and social values, such as teamwork, respect and sportsmanship. We offer children a positive sports experience while promoting a healthy, active lifestyle.  A variety of sport camps such as volleyball, soccer, basketball and track and field will be offered this summer.  More info HERE.
